titles.title: I could sing of your love

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: Over the mountains and the sea your river runs with love for me and I will open my heart and let the Healer set me free

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: I'm happy to be in the truth and I will daily lift my hands for I will always sing of when your love came down

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I could sing of your love forever, I could sing of your love forever

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: Oh, I feel like dancing it's foolishness I know, but when the world has seen the light they will dance with joy like we're dancing now
